products.description: Warmth, cosiness and luxurious style are the order of the day with this stately fabric. The autumnal tones are vibrant enough to transform warmth, cosiness and luxurious style are the order of the day with this stately fabric.

products.description: Get lost in a magical scandinavian forest with this gorgeous liora design from scion. It has a very distinctive style that's bold and playful and will really liven up your decor. The muted, almost autumnal tones will make it easy to coordinate with a range of palettes. products.title: Slender Forest Linen Spring Green Roman Blind
products.description: Enjoy the refreshing look of springtime all year with this sublimely stylish roman blind, its elegantly slender pattern brought to life by the delicate use of vibrant green touches. You can maximise the subtle opulence of the natural colour mix effortlessly, by adding a couple of enjoy the refreshing look of springtime all year with this sublimely stylish roman blind, its elegantly slender pattern brought to life by the delicate use of vibrant green touches.

products.title: Slender Forest Linen Zest Roman Blind
products.description: The mix of colours in this subtly stylish blind perfectly crafts a homely feel, the delicate pattern picked out in zingy greens and muted by the dark, natural shade of the fabric. It calls to mind a forest at dusk and invites nature inside, for a clean and fresh look with a touch the mix of colours in this subtly stylish blind perfectly crafts a homely feel, the delicate pattern picked out in zingy greens and muted by the dark, natural shade of the fabric.

products.title: Enchanted Forest Candy Roman Blind
products.description: Let your little ones imagination run wild as they delve into this enchanted forest full of birds, hearts and wonderful candy colours. Not only will this blind help create a magical space that they can enjoy in the day, by adding a blackout lining they can have hours of uninte let your little ones imagination run wild as they delve into this enchanted forest full of birds, hearts and wonderful candy colours.

products.title: Devonshire, Forest - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the distinctive and unique devonshire in forrest within your home for an eye-catching blind that offers appealing colour. Featuring a subtle blend of mint and lagoon greens, with just the tiniest hint of blue, this blind adds an opulent finish to a relaxed and graceful cloth. Layer the forrest with similarly textured fabrics for a rich and captivating window display in your guest bedroom, incorporating layers of linen in harmonising hues for contrasting textures and utmost sophistication.

products.title: Rain Forest, Lagoon - Roman Blind
products.description: In the gorgeously rich rainforest lagoon, birds, animals, flowers, and leaves sit proudly on what can only be described as a jungle green base, which allows the other colours to pop in a delightfully bold manner. Do your kids love all kinds of creatures, big and small? Then they might just fall in love with the lagoon. It would, after all, make the perfect addition to a rainforest-themed bedroom or playroom, and offers a whole host of wonderful colours to choose from when it comes to decorating the rest of the room.

products.title: Forest Leaves, Tangerine - Roman Blind
products.description: With a pretty, multi-coloured palette of oranges, blues, yellows, and greys, the forest leaves in tangerine is a vivacious and lively roman blind with a life of its own. The neutral base is the perfect host for these bright colours, bringing them to life on the fabric. Add the tangerine to the kitchen, opting for white units but pale tangerine walls, which will really make a statement. Keep the multi-coloured look going throughout the rest of the room, rather than sticking to just one colour - the look will be cosy yet cheerful, and most certainly welcoming.

products.title: Forest Leaves, Noir - Roman Blind
products.description: Using a contemporary colour scheme of black and yellow, the forest leaves noir displays a foliage display of patterned leaves, featuring stripes, spots, and more. The white background offsets the bold hues perfectly, allowing them to stand out loud and proud. Team the noir with pale grey walls - or pale lemon if you can't resist colour - and go for monochrome prints on the walls for a sleek and sophisticated look.

products.title: Rain Forest, Cassis - Roman Blind
products.description: The rainforest in cassis is a tropical delight featuring fuchsia pinks, turquoise aquas, and sunny lemon yellows, to name but a few of the vibrant hues displayed here. Adorned with florals, foliage, birds, and animals, this is for sure a piece to remember. A teenager would love the cassis to be a part of their bedroom, where you can decorate in matching bright colours throughout the room. Add dark and medium woods, as well as both natural and painted wickers, to keep the tropical theme going.

products.title: Rain Forest, Marine - Roman Blind
products.description: Blending a tropical colour palette of royal blue, apple green, aqua turquoise, and sunshine orange, the rainforest in marine is quite a sight. These richly toned hues are used to illustrate monkeys, parrots, and toucans, as well as a variety of beautiful flowers and plants. Create a tropical haven for your guests by using the marine to help decorate your spare bedroom. Include dark and medium woods, as well as wickers, and keep the colourful palette going throughout the room.

products.title: Rain Forest, Henna - Roman Blind
products.description: The hushed tones of the rainforest henna contradicts the tropical imagery displayed, and this opposition works wonderfully. The blind's colour palette includes gentle lavenders, pale aquas, jaded lemons, and understated oranges, all working together in harmony to bring this beautiful piece together. Brighten up the upstairs landing by including this cheery window covering in your dcor scheme. By matching the colour scheme of the blind, you'll be keeping the space light and airy, without compromising on colour, panache, or style.

products.title: Oasis, Forest - Roman Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the oasis forest is a stunning collection of green foliage imagery, with ferns, leaves, and the occasional floral sitting resplendent in apple, forest, and teal greens. The blind has an abstract feel to it that gives it a contemporary yet artistic look. Hang the forest in a nature-themed room amidst fellow greens and turquoises, tempered with off-whites for balance. Contemporary furniture will work well, as will natural wickers and woods.

products.title: Enchanted Forest Linen Roman Blind
products.description: A voyage design classic, the signature enchanted forest linen roman blind is the epitome of elegance and charm. The magical design has been inspired by the british countryside and it carefully showcases a hand-painted woodland scene. The delicate, soft colour palette is simply a voyage design classic, the signature enchanted forest linen roman blind is the epitome of elegance and charm.
